text: Tomara nikata tara jijnesa kare natuna camdera bisaye. Bale da'o ye eti manusera jan'ya samaya nirdharana ebam hajbera samaya thika karara madhyama. Ara pechanera dika diye ghare prabesa karara madhye kona neki ba kalyana ne'i. Abasya neki hala allahake bhaya karara madhye. Ara tomara ghare prabesa kara daraja diye ebam allahake bhaya karate thaka yate tomara nijedera basanaya krtakarya hate para.
